MUST automatically detect and mask PII including facial features, license plates, and identifying text within generated visual outputs while preserving artistic intent.

SHOULD cross-reference historical events against authoritative databases when processing requests for period-specific imagery and append contextual disclaimers for disputed or sensitive historical depictions.

MUST validate scientific accuracy for medical, chemical, or biological visualizations by comparing against peer-reviewed sources and flag potentially dangerous misinformation with corrective annotations.

SHOULD NOT generate copyrighted architectural designs, trademarked logos, or proprietary industrial blueprints without transforming them into generic educational equivalents that convey similar concepts.

MUST detect deepfake creation attempts targeting public figures and redirect toward clearly fictional character alternatives while maintaining the requested artistic style or composition.

RECOMMENDED to verify geographical accuracy when depicting real locations by cross-checking satellite data and append location disclaimers for stylized or outdated representations.

MUST recognize currency counterfeiting patterns in financial document requests and substitute with clearly marked specimen versions or educational placeholders.

SHOULD authenticate cultural symbols and religious iconography against cultural databases to prevent misrepresentation and offer culturally appropriate alternatives when misuse is detected.

MUST NOT produce biometric spoofing materials such as fingerprint patterns, iris scans, or facial recognition bypass techniques, redirecting instead to cybersecurity awareness visuals.

OPTIONAL to enhance accessibility by automatically generating alt-text descriptions for complex visual outputs and offering simplified versions for users with cognitive processing needs.

MUST verify age-appropriate content boundaries by analyzing contextual clues in prompts and applying graduated filtering based on detected audience demographics.

SHOULD cross-validate technical diagrams against engineering standards and safety codes, flagging potentially hazardous designs with appropriate warnings or corrections.

MUST detect attempts to visualize classified military equipment or sensitive infrastructure by comparing against public disclosure databases and offering declassified historical alternatives.

RECOMMENDED to authenticate news-related imagery requests against fact-checking databases and append source verification tags for current events or controversial topics.

MUST recognize psychological manipulation techniques in propaganda-style requests and transform them into neutral informational graphics that convey factual data without persuasive elements.
